scripts.deploy-local:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy realityeth/realityeth --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ realityeth/realityeth
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ realityeth/realityeth-rinkeby
scripts.deploy:kovan: yarn prepare:kovan && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ realityeth/realityeth-kovan
scripts.deploy:bsc: yarn prepare:bsc && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ realityeth/realityeth-bsc
scripts.deploy:ava: yarn prepare:ava && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ realityeth/realityeth-ava
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn prepare:arbitrum && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ realityeth/realityeth-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:sokol: yarn prepare:sokol && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ realityeth/realityeth-sokol
scripts.deploy:xdai: yarn prepare:xdai && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ realityeth/realityeth-xdai
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ realityeth/realityeth-polygon
scripts.deploy:all: yarn deploy:rinkeby && yarn deploy:mainnet && yarn deploy:kovan && yarn deploy:bsc && yarn deploy:sokol && yarn deploy:xdai && yarn deploy:polygon
scripts.prepare:mainnet: yarn clean && node render-templates.js 1 && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:ropsten: yarn clean && node render-templates.js 3 && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: yarn clean && node render-templates.js 4 && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:kovan: yarn clean && node render-templates.js 42 && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:bsc: yarn clean && node render-templates.js 56 && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:ava: yarn clean && node render-templates.js 43114 && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:arbitrum: yarn clean && node render-templates.js 42161 && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:sokol: yarn clean && node render-templates.js 77 && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:xdai: yarn clean && node render-templates.js 100 && graph codegen
